string-array.name: strong_verbs
string-array.item: can
may
must
should
would

string-array.name: personal_pronouns
string-array.item: I
you
he
she
it
we
they

string-array.name: question_words
string-array.item: Why
Where
When
What
How
How much
How many
Who
Which of
Whose

string-array.name: question_english
string-array.item: It can take much time. (Сколько?)
She so often forgets her keys. (Почему?)
You will see him there. (Где?)
I may start the work. (Когда?)
The boss pays you good money. (Сколько?)
You will be at home at 5 pm. (Когда?)
They heard this story. (Какую историю?)
You will be able to come tomorrow. (Когда?)
She has so many problems with her son. (Почему?)
I need to go there. (Почему?)
I had to do it yesterday. (Когда?)
He likes expensive cars. (Какие?)
I may do it. (Что?)
You had to do this. (Когда?)
The children were so afraid of the guest. (Почему?)
He wanted so much to work with us. (Почему?)
She eats so much chocolate. (Почему?)
We must eat only healthy food. (Почему?)
They lived in Israel. (Где?)
You are so smart. (Почему?)
You want so much to know it. (Почему?)
You have paid for this 10 $. (Сколько?)
She must come to you. (Когда?)
They need our help. (Зачем?)
We had to explain them how to work. (Почему?)
She is so happy to see us. (Почему?)
They will be allowed to rest. (Сколько времени?)
You are so tired. (Почему?)
People came there to rest. (Кто?)
She wants to tell me a story. (Что?)
We may rest now. (Где?)
She brought food home. (Что?)
You saw the boss this morning. (Когда?)

string-array.name: question_english_answers
string-array.item: How much time can it take?
Why does she forget her keys so often?
Where will you see him?
When may I start the work?
How much money does the boss pay?
When will you be at home?
What story did they hear?
When will you able to come?
Why does she have so many problems with her son?
Why do I need to go there?
When did you have to do it?
What cars does he like?
What may I do?
When did you have to do this?
Why were the children so afraid of guests?
Why did he want so much to work with us?
Why does she eat so much chocolate?
Why must we eat only healthy food?
Where did they live?
Why are you so smart?
Why do you want so much to know it?
How much have you paid for this?
When must she come to you?
Why do they need our help?
Why did we have to explain them how to work?
Why is she so happy to see us?
How much time will they be allowed to rest?
Why are you so tired?
Who came there to rest?
What does she want to tell?
Where may we rest now?
What did she bring home?
When did you see the boss?

string-array.name: question_english_wh
string-array.item: You have bought some fruits. Что? Что случилось в том магазине?
She said him to come tomorrow. Когда?
They like chocolate ice cream. Какое?
Old Sam Johnson had three sons. Сколько?
Something bad has happened at his work. Что?
She lives somewhere in New York. Где?
The family Robertson lived in this house. Кто?
You didn’t come to their meetings. Почему?
She went to the theater almost every week. Куда?
The elephant drank 100 liters of water every day. Сколько?
Sam hasn’t come yet. Почему?
People buy food at the local supermarkets. Где?
You do it how you were taught by your Granny. Как?
You have brought something home. Что?
You have brought something home. Кто принес это?
We are going to go home. Куда?
It always happened suddenly. Как?
You were working on this problem for 3 hours. Сколько?
Someone took my pencil. Кто?
You haven’t come yet. Почему?
This is Jeffrey Simpson’s house. Чей?
You haven’t eaten the hamburger. Почему?

string-array.name: question_english_wh_answers
string-array.item: What has happened in that store?
When did she say to come?
What ice cream do they like?
How many sons did old Sam Johnson have?
What has happened at his work?
Where does she live in New York?
Who lived in this house?
Why didn’t you come to their meeting?
Where did she go almost every week?
How many liters of water did the elephant drink every day?
Why hasn’t Sam come yet?
Where do people buy food?
How do you do it?
What have you brought home?
Who has brought this?
Where are you going to go?
How did it always happen?
How much time were you working on this problem?
Who took my pencil?
Why haven’t you come yet?
Whose is this house?
Why haven’t you eaten the hamburger?

string-array.name: question_english_advanced
string-array.item: There are three cars there. Который из них твой?
Mommy has brought us some chocolates. Что принесла?
There were my keys on the table. Кто видел?
I’ve sold my car to some New Yorker. Кому?
Some of us will be sent to Texas. Кого из?
It will take 2 hours. Сколько времени?
I worked in Japan about a year. Как долго?
About a hundred of the guests will come to your birthday. Сколько?
You have spent for the entertainment a thousand bucks. Сколько?
Something strange has happened there. Что именно?
You have lost the money. Как могло случиться, что…?

string-array.name: question_english_advanced_answers
string-array.item: Which of these cars is yours?
What has Mommy brought us?
Who saw my keys on the tables?
Whom have you sold your car?
Which of us will be sent to Texas?
How much time will it take?
How long did you work in Japan?
How many guests will come to your birthday?
How much money have you spent for the entertainment?
What exactly has happened there?
How could be this possible that you have lost the money?

string-array.name: question_english_ru_to_en
string-array.item: Что вы будете пить?
Где она работает?
Почему тебе не нравится этот ресторан?
Где вы хотели покупать квартиру?
Почему я обязан туда идти?
Когда он собирается туда идти?
Какую пиццу мы выберем?
Что ты нам принес?
Как он мог нас подвести?
Что ей там понравилось?
Почему ты так боишься поговорить об этом с боссом?
Когда мне надо начинать работу?
Как часто она к вам приходила?
Почему нам нельзя слушать эту музыку?
Что он мог для нее сделать?
Почему они так плохо учатся?
Почему ты такой грустный?
Как ты мог ей это сказать?
Что там случилось?
Что вы хотите делать в нашем городе?
Какого типа работу она умеет делать?
Почему они нас не понимают?
Как ты мог умудриться потерять ключи?
Как мы сможем помочь этим людям?
Когда вы уехали из этой страны?
Что они обычно здесь покупают?
Кого ты боишься?
Почему тебе так нравится эта работа?
Почему ты не мог прийти вчера?
Почему вас не было в офисе два часа?
Как ты не боялся идти туда один?
Что он там будет делать?
Почему эти люди так ненавидят Америку?
Почему я не подумал об этом раньше?
Как ты мог забыть об этом?
Когда вы его там видели?
Что вас к этому привело?
Как ты назвал его? Он не обижается?
Почему я не купил эту машину? Она мне нравилась больше всех.
Почему вы не готовы к работе?
Как он смог так быстро разбогатеть?
От чего это зависит?
Как ты собираешься помогать своему несчастному брату?
Где вы купили эту вещь? Я хочу такую же!
Почему вы не жалуетесь об этом начальству?
Чего ты так стесняешься? Приходи! Все наши там будут!
Что вы хотели узнать об этом человеке?
Когда ты перестанешь думать об этом?
Почему этот полицейский всегда к нам придирается?
Кто из ваших родственников живет в этом городе?
Что ты должен был делать в командировке?
Почему ты так возмущаешься? По-моему, все в порядке.
Почему я до сих пор не спросил ее об этом?
Зачем ты позвал ее на эту вечеринку?
Почему я сегодня не остался дома?
Почему они так гордятся этим?
Почему это не подготовили заранее?
Что им разрешалось делать во время перерыва?
Что вы думаете о современной музыке? – Думаю, она ужасна.
Почему вы все время молчите? Высказывайтесь, я должен знать мнение каждого работника!
Кому ты собирался показывать свой новый проект?
Почему ты так уверен? Этого никто не знает точно!
Что они поняли из моей речи? – Боюсь, что ничего.
С какой стати я должен вам верить? Мне нужны доказательства, а не просто пустые слова!
Что нам нужно взять с собой?
Почему ничего до сих пор не сделано?
Чья помощь нужна для решения этой проблемы?
Как случилось, что наши проиграли?
Как долго вы собирались там оставаться?
Как я смогу вас благодарить за это?
Что помогло вам победить такого сильного врага?
Откуда это приходит и как с этим бороться?

string-array.name: question_english_ru_to_en_answers
string-array.item: What will you drink?
Where does she work?
Why don’t you like this restaurant?
Where did you want to buy an apartment?
Why must I go there?
When is he going to go there?
What pizza will we choose?
What have you brought us?
How could he cheat us?
What did she like there?
Why are you so afraid to speak with the boss?
When do I need to start the work?
How often did she come to you?
Why can’t we listen this music?
What could he do for her?
Why do they study so badly?
Why are you so sad?
How could you say this to her?
What has happen there?
What do you want to do in our city?
What kind of work can she do?
Why don’t they understand us?
How could you lose the keys?
How will we be able to help these people?
When did you leave this country?
What do they usually buy here?
Who are you afraid?
Why do you so like this work?
Why couldn’t you come yesterday?
Why didn’t you be in office for two hours?
How aren’t you afraid to go there alone?
What will he do there?
Why do these people so hate America?
Why didn’t I think about this before?
How could you forget about this?
When did you see him there?
What was you brought to this?
How did you call him? Doesn’t he get offended?
Why didn’t I buy this car? I liked it the most.
Why aren’t you ready to work?
How could he get rich so quick?
What is this depend on?
How are you going to help your poor brother?
Where did you buy this thing? I want the same too!
Why don’t you complain about this to your boss?
Why are you so shy? Come ! Everybody will be there!
What did you want to know about this person?
When will you stop to think about this?
Why does this police officer always get picked to us?
Which of our relatives lives in this city?
What did you have do in the business trip?
Why do you so get shocked? To my mind, everything is okay.
Why haven’t I asked her yet?
Why have you called her to the party?
Why didn’t I stay at home today?
Why are they so proud of this?
Why wasn’t this prepared in advance?
What might they do in a break?
What do you think about modern music? I think it’s terrible.
Why are you quit all time? Speak up, I must know the every worker’s opinion.
Whom were you going to show your new project?
Why are you so sure? Nobody knows this exactly!
What have they understood from my speech? I’m afraid that nothing.
Why do I believe you? I need proof, not simple worlds!
What do we need to bring with us?
Why is nothing done yet?
Whose help do we need to resolve this problem?
How did this happen that our team lost?
How long were you going to stay there?
How can I please you for this?
What helped you to win so strong enemy?
Where does it come and how fights with this?

string-array.name: question_past_en_to_en
string-array.item: He could help us.
She was very rich.
Granddaddy fought in three wars.
She learned many things from her Granny.
You drove me back home.
You were her friends.
This man was my boss.
You knew it before.
He had to come yesterday.
You thought about this very often.
Mary saw us there.
They spoke English in Italy.
We ran home.
He looked like a very rich man.
This guy sent her flowers and gifts.
She bought us a chocolate cake.
They gave him money.
We taught him to do it right.
The people ate this cake.
You heard about this.
She tried not to think about this.
John brought food home.
She went there almost every morning.
You might do it.
She wanted to try to do this.
You needed to know it before.
She read this book.
He did it right.
You helped him a lot.
They came here too often.
We caught a baby dinosaur.
He sat at his place.
We hoped for this.
She spent for this a lot of time.
They tried, but nothing came of it.
They taught us a lot of good things.
You understood me.

string-array.name: question_past_en_to_en_answer
string-array.item: Could he help us?
Was she very rich?
Did granddaddy fight in three wars?
Did she learn many things form her Granny?
Did you drive me back home?
Were you her friends?
Was this man my boss?
Did you know it before?
Did he have to come yesterday?
Did you think about this very often?
Did Mary see us there?
What language did they speak in Italy?
Who ran home? Did we run home?
Did he look like a very rich man?
Did this guy send her the flowers and gifts?
Did she buy us a chocolate cake?
Did they give him money?
Did we teach him to do it right?
Did the people eat this cake?
Did you hear about this?
Did she try not to think about this?
Did John bring food home?
Did she go there almost every morning?
Might you do it?
Did she want to try to do this?
Did you need to know it before?
Did she read this book?
Did he do it right?
Did you help him a lot?
Did they come here too often?
Did we catch a baby dinosaur?
Did he sit in his place?
Did we hope for this?
Did she spend for this a lot of time?
Did they try?
Did they teach us a lot of things?
Did you understand me?

string-array.name: negative_sentence_ru
string-array.item: Никто ранее не пытался сделать такую вещь
У меня нет никакого(кокого-либо) телевизора
Я не видел никаких(каких-либо) ключей на столе
Никто из моих друзей не может позволить (иметь возможность, быть в состоянии) себе такую машину
Ничто не могло принести им победу.
Я не думал ничего(чего-либо) плохого
Он не принес никакой(какой-либо) еды домой
Никто не собираеться спорить с тобой
Я не слышал никаких(каких-либо) новостей о этом парне
Никто не хотел даже слышать об этом
Мы не нуждаемся в никакой(какой-либо) помощи зесь
Я никого не боюсь
Я не встретил там никого из нашего города
Она не стисняется никого(кого-льбо) и ничего(чего-либо)
Он не сможет ничего(чего-либо) сделать с этим

string-array.name: negative_sentence_en
string-array.item: Nobody tried to do such thing before.
I don’t have any TV.\nI have no TV!
I didn’t see any keys on the table.\nI saw no keys on the table.
None of my friends can afford such a car.
Nothing could bring them a victory.
I didn’t think anything bad.\nI thought nothing bad.
He didn’t bring any food to home.\nHe brought no food to home.
Nobody is going to argue with you.
I didn’t hear any news about this guy.\nI heard no news about this guy.
Nobody wanted even to hear about this.
We don’t need any help here.\nWe need no help here.
I am not afraid of anybody.\nI am afraid of nobody.
I didn’t meet anybody there from our city.\nI met nobody there from our city.
She isn’t shy of anybody and anything.\nShe is shy of nobody and nothing.
He won’t be able to do anything with that.\nHe will be able to do nothing with that.

string-array.name: adjective_intensifiers_so_very_too_ru
string-array.item: Эта сумка слишком тяжелая. Ты не сможешь ее поднять.
Вы очень похожи на моего брата.
Она очень красивая.
Я очень хочу туда поехать.
Мне очень нужна твоя помощь.
Эта зарплата считается очень хорошей для молодого человека без опыта, как вы.
Ты хочешь с нами поехать? – Да, очень!
Это слишком дорого. Я не могу платить такие деньги.
Они все очень любят своего вождя. – В самом деле?
Этот человек очень знаменит в своей стране.
Мне очень нравится ваш шоколадный торт. Можно мне взять еще кусочек?
Их дочь такая талантливая. Она очень хочет стать знаменитой певицей.
Этот парень слишком полный. Он не сможет работать полицейским.
Вы слишком любите сладости. Вы бы лучше подумали о вашем здоровье.
Большое спасибо. Я очень доволен вашей работой.
Я очень люблю хорошее шампанское.
В своей стране он был очень важным человеком.
Все люди, которых ты здесь видишь, очень богаты.
Это будет очень сложно объяснить боссу.
Это так просто! Ты наверняка сможешь это сделать!
Ей очень нужно с тобой поговорить.
Ты разговариваешь с ними слишком серьезно! Попробуй пошутить, им понравится!
Ты такой сильный. Они там все тебя испугаются.
Наш командир говорит, что терпеть не может лишь два вида солдат: слишком тупых и слишком умных.
Я очень занят. Пожалуйста, позвоните попозже.
Встань, поздравь молодоженов. – Я бы хотел, чтобы ты это сделала вместо меня. – Ты так стесняешься своего русского акцента?

string-array.name: adjective_intensifiers_so_very_too_en
string-array.item: This bag is too heavy. You won’t be able to lift it.
You are very similar to my brother.
She is very beautiful.
I want to go there very much.
I need your help very much.
This salary consider very good for a young man without experience, as you.
Do you want to go with us? – Yes, very much!
It is too expensive. I can’t pay such money.
They all love their leader very much. – Really?
This man is very famous in his country.
I like your chocolate cake very much. May I take one more piece?
Their daughter is so talented. She wants to become famous singer.
This guy is too fat. He won’t be able to work as a policeman.
You love sweets too much. You would better think about yours health.
Thank you very much. I am very pleased of your work.
I like good champagne very much.
He was very important person in his country.
All people, whom you see here, are very rich.
It will be very difficult to explain to the boss.
It is so simple! You will be able to do this for sure.
She needs to talk with you very much.
You speak with them too serious! Try to joke, they will like it!
You are so strong. All of them will be afraid of you there.
Our commander says, that he can’t be patient only two types of soldiers: too stupid and too smart.
I am very busy. Please, call later.
Stand up, congratulate the newlyweds. I would like, that you do it instead of me. – Are you so shy yours Russian accent.
